data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Brecqhou, Guernsey so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Brecqhou, Guernsey

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Brecqhou.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Brecqhou, Guernsey to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Brecqhou, Guernsey. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, make the 54 people in the state of Brecqhou who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 44 believers in the state of Brecqhou the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 100 people living in Brecqhou through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.
